data.description: Your brain craves instant hits. Dopamine receptors flood from years of digital stimulation. The fight begins now - neural pathways primed for battle.
data.title: Ground Zero

data.description: Two weeks down, warrior. Your dopamine baseline stabilizes. Withdrawal hits hard - irritability, restlessness, cravings. Brain rewires for real rewards.
data.title: Fighter

data.description: 15 days of resistance. Dopamine baseline begins stabilizing. Early withdrawal may surface - irritability, restlessness, cravings. Brain starts rewiring.
data.title: Resister

data.description: 31 days building new neural pathways. Your commitment reshapes your relationship with technology as you discover deeper presence in daily life.
data.title: Scout

data.description: 61 days of discipline. Dopamine sensitivity improves. You find satisfaction in simple pleasures as real achievements trigger genuine reward responses.
data.title: Mindsmith

data.description: 96 days strong. Reward pathways shift fundamentally. Growing independence from digital dopamine hits becomes natural. You develop intrinsic motivation.
data.title: Lone Wolf

data.description: 136 days of development. Quick decisions emerge from balanced neurotransmitters. Serotonin and dopamine work in harmony as your brain optimizes.
data.title: Lightning

data.description: 181 days in. Alpha brain waves dominate focused states. Dopamine release becomes controlled and purposeful. You build neurobiological mastery over impulse.
data.title: The Dragon

data.description: 226 days of growth. Your regulated dopamine system becomes noticeable to others. Attention span, emotional regulation, and clear thinking develop.
data.title: Commander

data.description: 271 days of wisdom building. Brain's reward system operates like a fine-tuned engine. Pattern recognition and strategic decision-making strengthen.
data.title: Wizard

data.description: 316 days into final transformation. Neural rewiring approaches completion. Dopamine pathways develop permanent patterns for sustainable satisfaction.
data.title: The King

data.description: Digital stimulation hijacked your neural pathways. Dopamine receptors are oversaturated, creating dependency. This awareness is your first step toward freedom.
data.title: Awakening

data.description: Two weeks of intentional living. Your dopamine system begins gentle recalibration. Withdrawal may feel intense - mood swings, restlessness. Trust your wisdom.
data.title: Blossoming

data.description: 15 days of protection. Brain's reward system begins healing from overstimulation. Sleep cycles improve, emotional regulation strengthens. You nurture balance.
data.title: Protector

data.description: 31 days seeking deeper truth. Neuroplasticity allows your prefrontal cortex to flourish. Enhanced intuition emerges as mental clarity replaces fog.
data.title: Seeker

data.description: 61 days of reflection. Dopamine sensitivity gracefully restores. Simple moments bring genuine joy as your brain remembers finding beauty in presence.
data.title: Reflectress

data.description: 96 days weaving light into darkness. Reward pathways transform completely. Inner peace replaces external validation. You radiate calm confidence.
data.title: Lightweaver

data.description: 136 days of graceful ascension. Optimal brain chemistry creates effortless flow states. Serotonin and dopamine dance in harmony, supporting creativity.
data.title: Ascendant

data.description: 181 days of swan-like elegance. Nervous system operates from serene strength. Stress hormones stay balanced, allowing natural grace and wisdom to shine.
data.title: The Swan

data.description: 226 days of sacred wisdom development. Brain's reward system serves your highest purpose. Others notice your centered presence - result of a mind freed.
data.title: Priestess

data.description: 271 days of empress energy building. Peak neuroplasticity supports intuitive decision-making and emotional mastery. Dopamine pathways serve authenticity.
data.title: Empress

data.description: 316 days into queenly presence phase. Neural transformation approaches completion. Brain operates as intended - finding satisfaction in meaningful experiences.
data.title: The Queen
